title: Week Review & Integration
goal: Master `se` conversion and review all Week 6 vocabulary.

sections.content:
Warm-up (2-3 min)

Vocabulary check — say the Lojban:

1. own      → ?
2. pay      → ?
3. use      → ?
4. exchange → ?
5. keep     → ?
6. carry    → ?
7. move     → ?

(Answers: ponse, pleji, pilno, canja, ralte, bevri, muvdu)

Grammar Summary (3-4 min)

What You Learned This Week

1. The se Conversion Operator

se swaps x1 and x2 of the following selbri:

Original With se
x1 loves x2 x1 is-loved-by x2
x1 gives x2 to x3 x1 is-given by x2 to x3

2. When to Use se

  • Foreground the object (make it the topic)
  • Answer questions about the object
  • Maintain topic continuity across sentences

3. Week 6 Gismu (8)

Lojban x1 x2 English
ponse owner possession own
pleji payer payment pay
pilno user tool use
canja exchanger exchanged exchange
ralte keeper kept keep
bevri carrier carried carry
muvdu mover destination move
lebna taker taken take

Self-Test (5-6 min)

Part A: Vocabulary (8 points)

Translate to English:

  1. ponse →
  2. pleji →
  3. canja →
  4. ralte →

Translate to Lojban:

  1. use →
  2. carry →
  3. move →
  4. take →
Answers
  1. own
  2. pay
  3. exchange
  4. keep
  5. pilno
  6. bevri
  7. muvdu
  8. lebna

Part B: se Conversion (10 points)

Convert to se form:

  1. mi ponse la karce → ?
  2. la .bob. cu pilno la skami → ?
  3. do dunda la cukta la .alis. → ?
  4. mi tavla la .bob. la zarci → ?
  5. la .alis. cu ralte la plise → ?
Answers
  1. la karce se ponse mi
  2. la skami se pilno la .bob.
  3. la cukta se dunda do la .alis.
  4. la .bob. se tavla mi la zarci
  5. la plise se ralte la .alis.

Convert from se form:

  1. la skami se ponse la .tam. → ?
  2. ti se bevri mi → ?
  3. la cukta se canja do la .bob. → ?
  4. la karce se pilno la .alis. → ?
  5. do se prami mi → ?
Answers
  1. la .tam. cu ponse la skami
  2. mi bevri ti
  3. do canja la cukta la .bob.
  4. la .alis. cu pilno la karce
  5. mi prami do

Part C: Natural Usage (7 points)

Write sentences for each scenario:

  1. Say you own a book. (normal focus on you)
  2. Say the book is owned by you. (focus on book)
  3. Bob is talked to by Alice about the market.
  4. The computer is used by people.
  5. Say you pay 50 to Tom. (normal)
  6. Say 50 is paid by you to Tom. (focus on amount)
  7. Create a two-sentence passage where the topic stays consistent using se.
Answers
  1. mi ponse la cukta
  2. la cukta se ponse mi
  3. la .bob. se tavla la .alis. la zarci
  4. la skami se pilno la prenu
  5. mi pleji mu no la .tam.
  6. mu no se pleji mi la .tam.
  7. Example: la cukta se dunda mi la .bob. .i la cukta cu melbi

Integration Challenge (1-2 min)

Write Both Versions

Take these 5 sentences and write both normal and se versions:

  1. I use the car.
  2. Alice gives the book to Bob.
  3. You keep the computer.
  4. Tom pays 100 to me.
  5. I carry the chair.
Answers
  1. mi pilno la karce / la karce se pilno mi
  2. la .alis. cu dunda la cukta la .bob. / la cukta se dunda la .alis. la .bob.
  3. do ralte la skami / la skami se ralte do
  4. la .tam. cu pleji pa no no mi / pa no no se pleji la .tam. mi
  5. mi bevri la stizu / la stizu se bevri mi

Week 6 Complete Reference

Gismu (8):

Lojban English Lojban English
ponse own ralte keep
pleji pay bevri carry
pilno use muvdu move
canja exchange lebna take

Key Cmavo:

Lojban Function
se swaps x1 and x2

Cumulative vocabulary: 56 gismu

Summary

You completed Week 6. You mastered the se conversion operator, which swaps x1 and x2 to change the topic/focus without changing the meaning. You learned 8 new gismu related to possession and exchange.

Next week preview: Week 7 introduces te, ve, and xe — conversions that swap x1 with x3, x4, and x5 respectively.

Congratulations

la .lojban. se cilre do

(Lojban is being learned by you.)

Six weeks complete. You're manipulating Lojban structure with real skill.
